doc.title: I Want a Woman
doc.plot: The quest for love of four Russian immigrant men over the course of a year. We get up-close-and-personal with Alik, Boris, Denis and Sasha, and discover what these men really want in a woman. By revealing themselves on camera, they expose their aspirations, their often controversial attitudes towards women and love, and show their victories and failures during the search for a woman in a new country.
